description: A delegation of eminent Muslim citizens called on the Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, today. The members of the delegation included Maulana Kalbe Jawwad – Shia Cleric; Shri Kamar Agha &ndash
caption: narendramodi.in
message: Met a delegation of eminent Muslims. They shared their joy on the outcomes of my Saudi Arabia visit & on Government's development agenda. Talked about Govt's efforts to ensure financial inclusion, crop insurance & our focus on girl child education. http://www.narendramodi.in/delegation-of-eminent-muslims-calls-on-pm-440308
